item.title: About Me
item.description: 👋 Hello! I’m Chloe Abrasada. I actually have a second name that I don’t use for branding purposes (jkjk). I’m a productivity nerd 👩‍🏫, web lurker 💻, and design enthusiast 🎨.

item.title: Building this Website
item.description: Oldest to latest 07/26/2021 Quartz Set-up 07/27/2021 Site actually FINALLY up lol struggled through that What I didn’t know before this lol Wikilinks don’t work on Github Pages Doesn’t support spaces 07/29/2021 Fixed backlinks What I didn’t know before this There was an error in my config.

item.title: Navigating the Garden
item.description: Hello! 👋 Thank you so much for being here! In this page, I map out how this garden is structured for ease of navigation.

item.title: On Digital Gardens
item.description: This digital garden is one of my personal projects this year! I’m still learning if there’s a proper way of setting it up.
